name: One Last Hope (ignismc)
description:
One Last Hope is a platformer game to plant trees across the place to save a destroyed world while beating people that causes harm into it. The goal is to go to each dead tree and revive it to earn score and every time you revive 3 trees you will be asked easy questions about deforestation. If you get the answer right you will get more points. The level will end when you revive the last tree per level.

Final Project System Integration 2022 2D 
Platformer game using C# Unity 2021.3.11f1

Main purpose is to create a short platformer game that will bring awareness about deforestation.
